content: {"locationId": "7769", "organizationId": "6455", "name": "Upper Dorchester Community Ministries", "address1": "101 Ridge Street", "address2": "", "city": "Saint George", "state": "SC", "zipCode": "29477", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.18486", "longitude": "-80.57762", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Our Mission at Upper Dorchester Community Ministries Food Bank located at 101 Ridge Street, St. George, SC 29477 is to serve others who are in need.  We have been open 17 years and offer food and clothing when times are tough for families to be able to buy either or both. We also assist with Snap Information and information on other helpflul organizations depending on what each visitor may need.   Our emblem is Loaves and fishes because we can feed so many with so little if we work together in conjuction with our community and The Low Country Food Bank in Charleston where our warehouse is located. We operate only from donations from our Community and surrounding areas. We can offer clothing free due to all the generous people who donate these clothes in various sizes. We have a staff of volunteers who have long been with our food bank who are experienced and have a heart for service. Call 843-696-3485 with any questions.", "notes": "Please bring current drivers license for computer entries for our food bank. We are located at 101 Ridge Street St. George Sc 29477. If coming into St. George Westbound, turn left at red light by United Bank. Continue down a short distance amd you will see old Courthouse on RHS  and our signs. Come in front door. It will be open. We are down hall on RHS in the building. If coming off I-95 and coming eastbond, turn right at United Bank.
